item.title: Detect the OS Perl Code is Running Under
item.description: I was looking into updating a couple of my perl modules because rt.cpan.org is being sunset early in 2021. As part of this I thought it was time to stop cpan testers from testing my module under Windows since it is currently not really supported. I was not sure how to go about doing this, so I reached out the good people in the “Perl Programmers” group on FaceBook. I got some great links and suggestions.
